result.purpose: Responsible for implementing caching mechanisms and metrics for a cache system, including serialization and Redis integration.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating caching logic, metrics, and testing in separate files for maintainability and clarity.

pkg/cache/cache.go.purpose: Defines caching interfaces and JSON codec for serialization in a cache system.

pkg/cache/cache_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for cache serialization and deserialization functionality.

pkg/cache/metrics.go.purpose: Defines metrics for cache operations in a wallet service.

pkg/cache/redis.go.purpose: Implements a Redis cache instance with methods to resolve and store values.

pkg/cache/redis_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for Redis cache implementation using a test framework.
